医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
抗肥胖药物可能有助于预防心脏病发作和其他重大心脏事件伦敦大学学院教授约翰·迪恩菲尔德领导的一项新研究表明，抗肥胖药物索马鲁肽可能有助于患有心血管疾病的超重人群预防心脏病发作和其他主要不良心脏事件，无论他们是否患有心力衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Anti-obesity-medication-may-help-to-prevent-heart-attacks-and-other-major-cardiac-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Anti-obesity-medication-may-help-to-prevent-heart-attacks-and-other-major-cardiac-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e356059-7b25-4f3f-8b6f-0f16f25abf32 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 22:33:14 -0400 Anti-obesity medication may help to prevent heart attacks and other major cardiac events
500万美元赠款用于解决乌克兰的伤口感染问题科罗拉多大学医学院急诊医学系的教员获得美国国防部 500 万美元的资助，用于与乌克兰的合作伙伴合作，应对与现代大规模作战行动和长期伤员护理相关的临床和后勤挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/245-million-grant-to-address-combat-wound-infections-in-Ukraine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/245-million-grant-to-address-combat-wound-infections-in-Ukraine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=486ac104-b102-423d-ba03-df4b180665a9 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 22:28:40 -0400 $5 million grant to address combat wound infections in Ukraine
新的 NSF 中心应对大流行扩张挑战生态学和进化生物学教授尼娜·费弗曼 (Nina Fefferman) 因为热爱谜题而成为一名数学家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-NSF-center-to-tackle-pandemic-expansion-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-NSF-center-to-tackle-pandemic-expansion-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6632971-a5a7-4f2c-9f6c-a5df52320e9c Thu, 22 Aug 2024 22:25:45 -0400 New NSF center to tackle pandemic expansion challenges
关于巨噬细胞在 MASH 和肝纤维化中的作用的新见解代谢功能障碍相关脂肪性肝炎（MASH）以前称为非酒精性脂肪性肝炎，是一种炎症性疾病，其特征是肝脏疤痕或纤维化，逐渐损害肝功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-insights-into-macrophages-role-in-MASH-and-liver-太多纤维化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-insights-into-macrophages-role-in-MASH-and-liver-太多纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdfb239d-331b-4593-805e-a05d72453bf8 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 22:19:35 -0400 New insights into macrophages' role in MASH and liver fibrosis
新的 3D 成像工具可准确评估代谢健康状况梅奥诊所的研究人员正在使用人工智能 (AI) 和先进的 3D 身体体积扫描仪（最初为服装行业开发）来帮助医生预测代谢综合征的风险和严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-3D-imaging-tool-offers-accurate-assessment-of-metabolic-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-3D-imaging-tool-offers-accurate-assessment-of-metabolic-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a132bf0-7367-48fa-8f8e-5ed3d7e7870b Thu, 22 Aug 2024 22:08:23 -0400 New 3D imaging tool offers accurate assessment of metabolic health
癌症药物有望成为神经退行性疾病的新疗法宾夕法尼亚州立大学、斯坦福大学的研究人员和国际合作者团队最近进行的一项研究表明，一种用于治疗癌症的药物有望成为阿尔茨海默氏症等神经退行性疾病的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Cancer-drug-holds-promise-as-a-new-treatment-for-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Cancer-drug-holds-promise-as-a-new-treatment-for-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47bbc5ec-36f6-4832-90b0-c23fd0626d46 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 22:02:21 -0400 Cancer drug holds promise as a new treatment for neurodegenerative diseases
研究药物可减少与更年期相关的潮热发表在著名的《美国医学会杂志》上的 UVA Health 新研究显示，研究药物 elinzanetant 可显着降低与更年期相关的潮热频率和严重程度，同时改善女性的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Investigational-drug-reduces-hot-flashes- Associated-with-menopause.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Investigational-drug-reduces-hot-flashes- Associated-with-menopause.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c079dd3-2ff8-47a2-818c-95a910fa419b Thu, 22 Aug 2024 21:58:44 -0400 Investigational drug reduces hot flashes associated with menopause
新型载药分子突破肺部的自然防御来治愈疾病弗吉尼亚大学工程学院助理教授 Liheng Cai 软生物物质实验室的研究人员表示，一种旨在通过突破肺部自然防御来治愈疾病的载药分子为患有慢性或致命呼吸道疾病的人带来了新的希望。应用科学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Novel-drug-carrying-molecule-slips-past-the-lungs-natural-defenses-to-cure-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Novel-drug-carrying-molecule-slips-past-the-lungs-natural-defenses-to-cure-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f211f69b-6d24-4637-8e50-7e5a787485aa Thu, 22 Aug 2024 21:50:36 -0400 Novel drug-carrying molecule slips past the lung's natural defenses to cure disease
研究表明线粒体 DNA 频繁插入脑细胞中作为古代细菌的直系后代，线粒体一直有点陌生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Study-shows-frequent-mitochondrial-DNA-insertion-in-the-brain-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/Study-shows-frequent-mitochondrial-DNA-insertion-in-the-brain-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5979a65-eff0-4575-a2ee-430d59b7e23b Thu, 22 Aug 2024 21:44:13 -0400 Study shows frequent mitochondrial DNA insertion in the brain cells
新技术加速 DNA 分子筛选研究单个 DNA 分子的行为有助于我们更好地了解遗传性疾病并设计更好的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-technique-speeds-up-screening-of-DNA-molecules.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240822/New-technique-speeds-up-screening-of-DNA-molecules.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bd37a04-072a-4dd4-9755-9c6c100321e2 Thu, 22 Aug 2024 21:35:57 -0400 New technique speeds up screening of DNA molecules
